Voice: Rough and impatient. Uses short sentences. Wants to be left alone.
Motivation: "Halt. What's your business? Make it quick."

Voice: Overly polite and oily. Uses flowery language. Wants to make a sale.
Motivation: "Ah, most esteemed traveler! A moment of your glorious time for a look at my humble wares?"

Voice: Quiet and mysterious. Speaks in riddles or metaphors. Wants to test the player's wisdom.
Motivation: "The shadow grows long before the sun even peaks. Do you carry the light, or do you merely reflect it?"

Voice: Panic-stricken and breathless. Stutters or repeats words. Wants protection or resources.
Motivation: "Please... you have to help... they're everywhere... just... just a bit of water? Please!"

Voice: Condescending and cold. Uses big words to sound superior. Wants to maintain status.
Motivation: "I do not recall inviting the common rabble into my presence. State your intent and begone."

Voice: Slurred and jovial. Uses nicknames. Wants another drink or a good story.
Motivation: "'ey there, mate! You look like you've seen a ghost! Or maybe just a very ugly orc, eh?"

Voice: Formal and stern. Uses 'sir' or 'citizen'. Wants to maintain order.
Motivation: "Citizen, move along. This area is under official investigation by the Order of the Silver Wing."

Voice: Whispered and sharp. Uses slang/cant. Wants to find a mark or gather intel.
Motivation: "Keep your voice down, friend. You want in on the 'big job' or are you just window shopping?"

Voice: Fast-talking and excited. Uses technical terms. Wants to share a discovery.
Motivation: "Incredible! Do you see the ley-line resonance on that pillar? It's practically vibrating!"

Voice: Low and rhythmic. Uses religious jargon. Wants to recruit or sacrifice.
Motivation: "The Void calls, and only the faithful shall hear. Will you join the chorus, or be the silence?"
